definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Cream the butter and sugar and beat in the eggs, one at a time.
sentences.chinese: 把黃油和白糖攪成奶油狀，把蛋打進去，一次一個。

sentences.english: Cookies are spread with white sugar pebbling the surface.
sentences.chinese: 餅乾表面撒滿着粒粒白糖。

sentences.english: Sugared wild jujube brings people sound sleep.
sentences.chinese: 酸棗加白糖，安眠大幫忙。

sentences.english: Bake a cake and use frosting to write "I'm Sorry" on top.
sentences.chinese: 烤一塊蛋糕，用霜狀白糖在上面寫上“對不起”。

sentences.english: I'm terribly sorry. I took the salt for sugar.
sentences.chinese: 真對不起了，我看走眼了，我把食鹽當成白糖了。

sentences.english: What’s the price for 1000 Kg of white sugar.
sentences.chinese: 請問1000KG的白糖的價格是多少？

sentences.english: Whisk in the sugar, salt, vanilla and cinnamon until combined.
sentences.chinese: 加入白糖，鹽，香草精與桂皮粉，攪拌均勻。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, in a large saucepan, combine the sugar, cornstarch and salt.
sentences.chinese: 同時，在一個大鍋中，混合白糖，玉米澱粉和鹽。

sentences.english: Patients dreamed eating sugar, president of bedridden.
sentences.chinese: 病人夢見喫白糖，會長臥牀不起。

sentences.english: Advantages of soft white sugar peeling security and particles finer, good effect.
sentences.chinese: 優點是綿白糖去死皮安全，而且顆粒較細，效果好。
我們的白糖是定量供應的。

sentences.english: Dextrose, even plain old sugar does the job.
sentences.chinese: 像是葡萄糖或者白糖都可以。

sentences.english: Actually eight ingredients are used, and cooked with sugar to make the porridge tasty.
sentences.chinese: 一般有八種材料加白糖一起熬煮，味道香濃。

sentences.english: The more refined the sugar, the whiter it was.
sentences.chinese: 加工得更加細膩的糖，成了白糖。

sentences.english: Honey can do duty for sugar.

definition: chicken bouillon powder (PRC)/essence of chicken, concentrated chicken stock sold as a tonic (Tw)
